attributes.comment:
As a parent of an adoptive child, I know first hand the insurmountable amount of paperwork,
difficulty of working with multiple agencies, background checks, expense and the wait for a
parent longing to give an orphaned child a loving home and chance of a life similar to what we
enjoy. A child who may never experience more than loneliness, despair and possibly even
death.

The issue at hand is about helping another human being, not putting additional financial
hardships on those who are trying to help others. Our government already endorses murder of
children (abortion), must they also try to profit even more from those who are reaching out to
save a human life?

My brother and daughter-in-law have been trying to adopt for many months with multiple delays.
This fee increase will just continue to be yet another setback and hardship for them in reaching
their dream of being loving parents to a child in need.

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Anonymous
